TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service
content: Welcome to SafeHaven. By accessing our service, you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions.
SafeHaven allows users within a community to raise alerts and share images with automatic geotagging. For these features to function, users must share their location with the app.

Users can participate in group chats with others in their local area, identified by the first half of their postcode, and engage in private chats with pre-programmed messages. All members in chats are displayed by address.
You agree not to use SafeHaven for any unlawful purposes, and you shall comply with all applicable laws and regulations, including the UK GDPR and the Data Protection Act 2018, while using the app.
